title: Technology Acceptance Model (TAM)-Based Project Design to Improve Vocational Education MOOC Adoption

context.prior_knowledge: Basic MOOC concepts and foundational science knowledge
context.additional_context: Instructional design must consider MOOC content accessibility and utilization in smartphone-centric limited technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze user experience elements when designing MOOC content by applying the TAM model (perceived ease of use, usefulness).
Learners can derive strategies to enhance user acceptance in MOOC-based vocational education scenarios using the PBL (Problem-Based Learning) approach.
Learners can propose team-based project improvements for a MOOC interface optimized for smartphone environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
